name: ScrambleRND
description:
This is a remake of one of my favourite side scrolling shooters from the eighties. The game plays like the old Vectrex version of Scramble (the best!), but looks like an Atari 2600 game.

Also, the landscape is constructed randomly each time you play. It's not amazingly random, but enough to spice things up :)

The objective of the game is to reach and destroy the enemy base at the end of the city maze.

You earn points simply by staying alive and you recieve an extra life at 10.000 points.

Shoot the green fuel pods for additional fuel; your spaceship will crash when you run out of fuel.

Shoot enemy ships when in flight for additional points.

The game will restart, but at a higher difficulty, after destroying the enemy base.
